entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries overnight. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light near midnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 2 May 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h late in the morning. High 8. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 2 May 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 4.
